author: GameSpot
description:
Check out some of the best trailers from the latest Xbox Partner Preview which showcased some new reveals, gameplay, updates and more. See timestamps below for the trailers.

0:00 Tides of Annihilation Boss Fight Gameplay
4:33 Raji Kaliyuga Reveal Trailer

17:08 Crowsworn Trailer
title: Best Xbox Partner Preview Trailers | November 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Jessica Cogswell recently got to go check out the next project from the Vampire Survivors team, their upcoming game Vampire Crawlers set to come out in 2026. Check out the teams new take on the series.

#vampirecrawlers #vampiresurvivors
title: Vampire Crawlers A New Game From The Vampire Survivors Team

author: GameSpot
description:
Experience the latest gameplay reveal for Tides of Annihilation, a single-player Arthurian knight fantasy action-adventure.

This new trailer takes the journey from London to the Otherworld, the realm of Avalon, where Gwendolyn joins forces with her former rival Lamorak to face a powerful foe within the mirrored domain, Tyronoe.

All footage was captured in-game on PC.

Coming to Xbox Series X|S and Xbox on PC.
title: Tides of Annihilation | Mirror Boss Fight Gameplay Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
With Vampire Crawlers, Poncle Games is expanding the world of Vampire Survivors while also exploring a new genre: deckbuilders.

#vampirecrawlers #vampiresurvivors #gaming
title: Vampire Crawlers Is Ready To Become Your Next Obsession - Preview

author: GameSpot
description:
Here is our first look at Vampire Crawlers, the first Vampire Survivors spin-off, coming 2026.

In a dark world, a new adventure begins. Explore maps, level up powers, kill monsters. Find treasures.

Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard from Vampire Survivors turns the snowballing thrill of Vampire Survivors into a turbo turn‑based, card‑driven BLOBBER with rogue-lite elements. Build busted decks, explore familiar dungeons from a new perspective, and unleash world‑ending combos. Either take your time and be tactical, or play turns as fast as you humanly can: the outcome is always accurate!

What is Vampire Crawlers about:

 • Snowballing, turn‑based carnage: Play cards in ascending mana order to land combos; each step multiplies the next card’s effect. Use Wilds to extend the stack and keep going to 10, 20, 30… Can you reach infinite without shattering the screen? 

 • Pick your pace: The turbo turn-based engine provides accurate outcomes regardless of the speed at which you prefer to
title: Vampire Crawlers - Official Reveal Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
A glimpse into torment, a promise of suffering and chaos. 
Want it. Let your desire fester…

Unveil the first official gameplay trailer for Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival. This visceral, story-driven, single-player, survival horror action game throws you into a battle of wills against the legendary Pinhead and the malevolent Cenobites for the fate of your immortal soul. 

Set to release in 2026 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam, Clive Barker’s Hellraiser: Revival marks Doug Bradley’s return to the iconic role as the voice of Pinhead. Check out today’s new gut-wrenching trailer now, but be careful not to linger too long in the abyss…

Discover a realm of terrors as you take on dark cultist worshippers, sex-crazed deviants, and infernal monstrosities, harnessing unique abilities and an arsenal of jaw-dropping weapons that can be instruments of both misery and delight. 

Welcome to Hell.

#hellraiser #hellraisergame #pinhead
title: Clive Barker's Hellraiser: Revival - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
